mapper.select: SELECT sc.uid AS uid, s.uid AS studentUid, s.name AS studentName, c.uid AS courseUid, c.name AS courseName FROM student_course sc LEFT JOIN student s ON sc.student_uid = s.uid LEFT JOIN course c ON sc.course_uid = c.uid WHERE sc.is_deleted = 0 AND s.is_deleted = 0 AND c.is_deleted = 0 AND sc.course_uid = #{courseUid}
